name: A Day in Granple-Bee's Garden
description:
Synopsis :

You are Bumble-Billy, a humble bumble-bee whose grandfather, Granple-Bee, went on vacation for one day. In a letter, he tasked you to look after his Celeriligno, a very rare fast-growing tree. Will ou be able to keep this plant alive ?

Controls :

Move : Arrow keys / Left Stick
Grab & Use a tool : Space / A
Drop a tool : Shift / B
Validate in menu : Space / A
